name: SALESFORCE [Login - Restricted IP/Time]
description: Salesforce, Inc. is a cloud-based software company that provides customer relationship management software. Salesforce provides various platform events for Real-Time Event Monitoring. LoginEvent is one such platform event that tracks the login activity of users who log in to Salesforce. This rule detects when a user tries to log in to Salesforce using an restricted IP address or time.

name: SALESFORCE [Login - Rate Exceeded]
description: Salesforce, Inc. is a cloud-based software company that provides customer relationship management software. Salesforce provides various platform events for Real-Time Event Monitoring. LoginEvent is one such platform event that tracks the login activity of users who log in to Salesforce. This rule detects instances where a user or application tries to log in to Salesforce more frequently than once every second, exceeding the allowable login rate.

name: SALESFORCE [Login - Multiple Password Lockout]
description: Salesforce, Inc. is a cloud-based software company that provides customer relationship management software. Salesforce provides various platform events for Real-Time Event Monitoring. LoginEvent is one such platform event that tracks the login activity of users who log in to Salesforce. This rule detects when a user makes an excessive number of login attempts to Salesforce and triggers a password lockout.
tags: salesforce,Credential Access,Brute Force,T1110,Defense Evasion,Initial Access,Persistence,Privilege Escalation,Valid Accounts,T1078,md-info

name: SALESFORCE [Multiple Login Failures - SAML]
description: Salesforce, Inc. is a cloud-based software company that provides customer relationship management software. Salesforce provides various platform events for Real-Time Event Monitoring. LoginEvent is one such platform event that tracks the login activity of users who log in to Salesforce. This rule identifies any multiple Failed login attempts by a user or client application using an SAML authentication method.

name: SALESFORCE [Multiple Login Failures - OAUTH]
description: Salesforce, Inc. is a cloud-based software company that provides customer relationship management software. Salesforce provides various platform events for Real-Time Event Monitoring. LoginEvent is one such platform event that tracks the login activity of users who log in to Salesforce. This rule identifies any multiple Failed login attempts by users or client applications using OAUTH method.

name: SALESFORCE [Login - Insecure Login]
description: Salesforce, Inc. is a cloud-based software company that provides customer relationship management software. Salesforce provides various platform events for Real-Time Event Monitoring. LoginEvent is one such platform event that tracks the login activity of users who log in to Salesforce. This rule detects attempts by a user to log in to Salesforce via an unsecured or unencrypted channel.
tags: salesforce,Exfiltration,Exfiltration Over Alternative Protocol,T1048,Exfiltration Over Unencrypted Non-C2 Protocol,T1048.003,md-info

name: SALESFORCE [Login - Blocked Domain]
description: Salesforce, Inc. is a cloud-based software company that provides customer relationship management software. Salesforce provides various platform events for Real-Time Event Monitoring. LoginEvent is one such platform event that tracks the login activity of users who log in to Salesforce. This rule detects when a user tries to log in to Salesforce with a domain that is not listed in the configured MyDomain Single Sign-On (SSO) setting.

name: SALESFORCE [Login - Export Restricted]
description: Salesforce, Inc. is a cloud-based software company that provides customer relationship management software. Salesforce provides various platform events for Real-Time Event Monitoring. LoginEvent is one such platform event that tracks the login activity of users who log in to Salesforce. This rule detects when a person tries to log in to Salesforce from an IP that is situated in a prohibited country.

name: SALESFORCE [Login - Unknown Error]
description: Salesforce, Inc. is a cloud-based software company that provides customer relationship management software. Salesforce provides various platform events for Real-Time Event Monitoring. LoginEvent is one such platform event that tracks the login activity of users who log in to Salesforce. This rule triggers when a user fails to login to Salesforce due to unknown error.
